segment.source: How to use the Internal Install page in the IEAK 11 Customization Wizard to customize Setup for the default browser and the latest browser updates.
segment.target: How to use the Internal Install page in the IEAK 11 Customization Wizard to customize Setup for the default browser and the latest browser updates.

segment.source: Use the Internal Install page in the IEAK 11 Wizard (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)
segment.target: Use the Internal Install page in the IEAK 11 Wizard (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)

segment.source: Use the Internal Install page in the IEAK 11 Wizard
segment.target: Use the Internal Install page in the IEAK 11 Wizard

segment.source: The Internal Install page of the Internet Explorer Customization Wizard 11 lets you customize Setup for the default browser and the latest browser updates, based on your company’s guidelines.
segment.target: The Internal Install page of the Internet Explorer Customization Wizard 11 lets you customize Setup for the default browser and the latest browser updates, based on your company’s guidelines.

segment.source: The customizations made on this page only apply to Internet Explorer for the desktop on Windows 7.
segment.target: The customizations made on this page only apply to Internet Explorer for the desktop on Windows 7.

segment.source: To use the Internal Install page
segment.target: To use the Internal Install page

segment.source: Lets your employees pick their own default browser.
segment.target: Lets your employees pick their own default browser.

segment.source: Do not set IE as the default browser.
segment.target: Do not set IE as the default browser.

segment.source: Won’t set IE as the default browser.
segment.target: Won’t set IE as the default browser.

segment.source: However, your employees can still make IE the default.
segment.target: However, your employees can still make IE the default.

segment.source: Click Next to go to the User Experience page or Back to go to the Custom Components.
segment.target: Click Next to go to the User Experience page or Back to go to the Custom Components.
